channel.title: Kicksecure 17.2.8.1 - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Download
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Download
([What is a point release?](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Point_Release))
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, an in-place release upgrade is possible using the [Kicksecure repository](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
----
# Major Changes
* grub-live: * fix `dracut` vs `initramfs-tools` package installation check * helper-scripts: * add [`chmod-calc`](https://github.com/Kicksecure/helper-scripts/blob/master/man/chmod-calc.1.ronn) * `str_replace`: Avoid closing and re-opening target file (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!) * `str_replace`, `str_match`: Don't allow massive file reads to block SIGINT termination (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!) * improve `str_match` * improve `str_replace` * msgcollector: * minor fix: check if `msgcollector-gui` systemd user unit is masked and don't start `msgcollector-gui` in that case * systemcheck: * fix systemcheck start from start menu * tor-control-panel: * fix restart-tor-gui * ISO: * Fix cosmetic `unicode.pf2 not found` GRUB error (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!) derivative-maker * Enable building CLI Kicksecure ISOs (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!) * Disable debian-installer, needs more testing (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)
----
# Full difference of all changes
[https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.8.0-developers-only...17.2.8.1-developers-only](https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.8.0-developers-only...17.2.8.1-developers-only)

item.title: Kicksecure 17.2.8.1 - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Download

Kicksecure – 6 Sep 24

Download Kicksecure (FREE)

FREE Download Kicksecure. Kicksecure can be installed on a physical machine as a host operating system (OS), as a guest OS inside a virtual machine, or as a portable host OS on a USB data stick.

(What is a point release?)

Upgrade

Alternatively, an in-place release upgrade is possible using the Kicksecure repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 10 Oct 24

Donating to Kicksecure

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Kicksecure – 15 Aug 24

Contribute to Kicksecure

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Major Changes

  • grub-live:
    • fix dracut vs initramfs-tools package installation check
  • helper-scripts:
    • add chmod-calc
    • str_replace: Avoid closing and re-opening target file (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)
    • str_replace, str_match: Don’t allow massive file reads to block SIGINT termination (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)
    • improve str_match
    • improve str_replace
  • msgcollector:
    • minor fix: check if msgcollector-gui systemd user unit is masked and don’t start msgcollector-gui in that case
  • systemcheck:
    • fix systemcheck start from start menu
  • tor-control-panel:
    • fix restart-tor-gui
  • ISO:
    • Fix cosmetic unicode.pf2 not found GRUB error (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)
      derivative-maker
    • Enable building CLI Kicksecure ISOs (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)
    • Disable debian-installer, needs more testing (Thanks to @ArrayBolt3!)

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.8.0-developers-only…17.2.8.1-developers-only

Read full topic
